    • addCardToHand

      public void addCardToHand​(Card newCard, Coordinates coordPlayer) throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      adds a new card to hand of player
      Parameters:
      newCard - new card to be added to hand, if the hand is full,
      coordPlayer - coordinates of player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if hand is full

    • throwCard

      public Card throwCard​(int cardNumber) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      remove a card from the hand of player and returns it
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - index of card to throw between 1 and number of cards in hand
      Returns:
      card thrown from the hand of the player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card to throw is not valid

    • getNumberOfCards

      Parameters:
      cardNumber - index of card to chose
      Returns:
      Card selected
